thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Base Camp
thread.title_full: Base Camp - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: John W
title: Base Camp
text: This hotel was exactly what you expect a needed the room was clean and tidy, comfy bed, tea making facilities, nice warm shower and large TV. We didnt spend much time in the room but the the hotel was great, easy to find and the staff were great. Daisy and Rodrigo helped us check in and let us store our bag at the hotel while we explored London. If you want some where comfy, easy to find and a stones throw from London Euston this place is tops.
